transcription.text: Hello?
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Thank you.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Tine kusila? Yes po.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Thank you.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Yes po. Two months na rin pa ang gilidinan ba ng salary?
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Sad to hear, ma'am, no, na na-delay po yung salary ninyo. Until now, ma'am, delay?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Yes po.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Paano kayo, ma'am, yan? Since delay po yung sahod ninyo, ma'am.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Meron naman po ang tumutulong pero everyday expenses lang po.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Okay po. Ano, ma'am? Ano po sabi sa inyo, ma'am? Sa pinagtatrabaho ninyo.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Actually may inayos lang po sila para po maibig. Magbalik po ako sa system ng salary. Kami ng system sa salary.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Wala po ba na isabi sa inyo, ma'am, kung kailan tayo pwedeng makasahod? Kasi since matagal na yan, ma'am, no?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Wala po pong sinasal... Po?
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Since matagal na siya, ma'am, na hindi kayo nakasahod, wala po ba na-insert sa inyo kung kailan?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Oo nga po eh. Wala po pong nai-inform sa amin.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Okay po. Yan ito, ma'am, kasi 61 days na rin tumutubo itong account mo dito kay Maya. 0.17% daily po yun. Since noong una, ma'am, maganda yung record mo. Ngayon lang talaga ng overview ng ganito katagal, dalawang buwan. Possible na rin kasi, ma'am, na magkaroon tayo ng bad credit score kay Maya. Kung patatagalin pa po natin na hindi makapagbayad.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: But if you want a separate video tapos i-upload at a wallet po lang rin nyo.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Baka by this time, ma'am, since matagal na rin po, mahabang panahon na rin po yung ibinigay sa inyo ni Maya,
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: I devil, I yunan lang ako lang, sensors not picked it!.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: baka gawin nyo na lang siya ng parahan, ma'am, na makapagbayad. Para maski pa paano, ma'am?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Iе silly is da. When xake ma malaw manaring tribukod pa siya. Nakahiti ulit.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Ma'am, hindi na rin po siya dagdag sa isipin po ninyo.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Once pa na makuha yung salary, ibabayad ko talaga, ma'am.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Pero wala lang talaga, ma'am, estimated date kung kailan, no?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Opo.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Yan ito, ma'am, notice and transfer sa amin itong account mo. Pwede ka pa rin matawagan, ma'am, ha? Hanggang hindi tayo nakakapag-tettle dito sa account nyo.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Yes, ma'am.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: And katulad yan, ma'am, is everyday din nag-a-account. I-accumulate po yung interest. Balikan na lang kita ng tawag, ma'am, if ever na maging okay na or may na-inform na sa inyo kung sa'yo lang tayo makapapasahod.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Okay po.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: So, ma'am, maraming salamat po. Thank you.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Okay po. Thank you po.
transcription.speaker: spk1

translation.tagalog: Hello?
translation.english: Hello?

translation.tagalog: Thank you.
translation.english: Thank you.

translation.tagalog: Tine kusila? Yes po.
translation.english: Tine kusila? Yes.

translation.tagalog: Thank you.
translation.english: Thank you.

translation.tagalog: Yes po. Two months na rin pa ang gilidinan ba ng salary?
translation.english: Yes. It's been two months and my salary is still delayed.

translation.tagalog: Sad to hear, ma'am, no, na na-delay po yung salary ninyo. Until now, ma'am, delay?
translation.english: Sad to hear, ma'am, that your salary has been delayed. Is it still delayed until now?

translation.tagalog: Yes po.
translation.english: Yes.

translation.tagalog: Paano kayo, ma'am, yan? Since delay po yung sahod ninyo, ma'am.
translation.english: What about you, ma'am? Since your salary is delayed?

translation.tagalog: Meron naman po ang tumutulong pero everyday expenses lang po.
translation.english: There are people helping me but only for daily expenses.

translation.tagalog: Okay po. Ano, ma'am? Ano po sabi sa inyo, ma'am? Sa pinagtatrabaho ninyo.
translation.english: Okay. What did your employer say, ma'am?

translation.tagalog: Actually may inayos lang po sila para po maibig. Magbalik po ako sa system ng salary. Kami ng system sa salary.
translation.english: Actually, they're fixing something so that the salary system can resume. It's about the salary system.

translation.tagalog: Wala po ba na isabi sa inyo, ma'am, kung kailan tayo pwedeng makasahod? Kasi since matagal na yan, ma'am, no?
translation.english: Did they not tell you, ma'am, when you will get paid? Because it's been a while already, right?

translation.tagalog: Wala po pong sinasal... Po?
translation.english: They haven’t said anything yet.

translation.tagalog: Since matagal na siya, ma'am, na hindi kayo nakasahod, wala po ba na-insert sa inyo kung kailan?
translation.english: Since it’s been a long time that you haven’t received your salary, ma'am, they haven't informed you when?

translation.tagalog: Oo nga po eh. Wala po pong nai-inform sa amin.
translation.english: Yes, they haven’t informed us yet.

translation.tagalog: Okay po. Yan ito, ma'am, kasi 61 days na rin tumutubo itong account mo dito kay Maya. 0.17% daily po yun. Since noong una, ma'am, maganda yung record mo. Ngayon lang talaga ng overview ng ganito katagal, dalawang buwan. Possible na rin kasi, ma'am, na magkaroon tayo ng bad credit score kay Maya. Kung patatagalin pa po natin na hindi makapagbayad.
translation.english: Okay. Because, ma'am, your Maya account has been accruing interest for 61 days. It's 0.17% daily. You had a good record before. It’s just now that it's been overdue for this long, two months. It's possible to have a bad credit score with Maya if we continue not paying.

translation.tagalog: But if you want a separate video tapos i-upload at a wallet po lang rin nyo.
translation.english: But if you want a separate video, you can just upload it to the wallet.

translation.tagalog: Baka by this time, ma'am, since matagal na rin po, mahabang panahon na rin po yung ibinigay sa inyo ni Maya,
translation.english: Maybe by this time, ma'am, since a long period has already been given by Maya...

translation.tagalog: I devil, I yunan lang ako lang, sensors not picked it!.
translation.english: I’ll try to see what I can do. Sensors didn’t pick it properly.

translation.tagalog: baka gawin nyo na lang siya ng parahan, ma'am, na makapagbayad. Para maski pa paano, ma'am?
translation.english: Maybe you can try to find a way to make a payment, ma'am, even partially?

translation.tagalog: Iе silly is da. When xake ma malaw manaring tribukod pa siya. Nakahiti ulit.
translation.english: It’s hard to explain... I’ll just try again when I get the chance.

translation.tagalog: Ma'am, hindi na rin po siya dagdag sa isipin po ninyo.
translation.english: So it won’t keep bothering your mind, ma'am.

translation.tagalog: Once pa na makuha yung salary, ibabayad ko talaga, ma'am.
translation.english: Once I receive my salary, I’ll really pay, ma'am.

translation.tagalog: Pero wala lang talaga, ma'am, estimated date kung kailan, no?
translation.english: But right now, there’s no estimated date, correct?

translation.tagalog: Opo.
translation.english: Yes.

translation.tagalog: Yan ito, ma'am, notice and transfer sa amin itong account mo. Pwede ka pa rin matawagan, ma'am, ha? Hanggang hindi tayo nakakapag-tettle dito sa account nyo.
translation.english: Okay, ma'am. This account has been transferred to us. You may still be contacted until it is settled.

translation.tagalog: Yes, ma'am.
translation.english: Yes, ma'am.

translation.tagalog: And katulad yan, ma'am, is everyday din nag-a-account. I-accumulate po yung interest. Balikan na lang kita ng tawag, ma'am, if ever na maging okay na or may na-inform na sa inyo kung sa'yo lang tayo makapapasahod.
translation.english: And ma'am, the interest keeps accumulating daily. I’ll call you back if things improve or if you’re informed of when you'll receive your salary.

translation.tagalog: Okay po.
translation.english: Okay.

translation.tagalog: So, ma'am, maraming salamat po. Thank you.
translation.english: So, ma'am, thank you very much. Thank you.

translation.tagalog: Okay po. Thank you po.
translation.english: Okay. Thank you.
